disabled_info: Here you can delete blocks from the game
replace_info: Here you replace blocks with others. The first is the one that is going to be replaced
replace_warning: If you replace a block like minecraft:stone or minecraft:deepslate, the game will not generate features such as ores. It also breaks the entire overworld generation, because minecraft first creates the shape of the world with minecraft:stone and then it decorates it, but if you replace minecraft:stone by something that can not be decorated such as minecraft:bedrock, then, the entire world will bedrock with no tress, no flowers, just bedrock.
